resources.string: Ignore illegal request packet.
The packet must be inbound.
Failed to retrieve recipient of address %s.
Cannot obtain request object from packet.
Failed to accept request. Request is invalid.
Ignoring wrong accept packet.
Failed to refuse request. Request is invalid.
Ignore wrong refuse packet.
Failed to cancel request. Request is invalid.
Ignore wrong cancel packet.
Failed to send update. Cannot find valid connection.
Ignore wrong data packet.
Failed to request update. Cannot find valid connection.
Ignore request update packet.
Failed to request disconnect. Cannot find valid connection.
Ignore request disconnect packet.
Validator not found for type %s.
Transaction error occurred: %s
Failed to cancel request. Temporal connection is invalid.
Stream I/O error.
Failed to register task. Connection is invlalid.
Failed to close expired connection. Connection is invalid.
This feature is not implemented yet :)
Failed to close connection. Connections is not expired yet.
